Text: Sure. If only he could learn to do mathematics. See http://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Konstantin_Meyl

Basically wikipedia is a huge accumulation of mainstream lies for the stupid sheeple. The elite knows this stuff to be real but the sheeple are not meant to believe it. Just do the experiments to verify his claims or study physics.
